headline: Lockheed Martin (LMT): Analyst Upgrades and International Deals Put Spotlight on Valuation After Dividend, Buyback Boost
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) has caught the attention of investors following several analyst upgrades that point to the company’s strong order backlog, improved operational performance, and recent uptick in international defense contracts. Amid ongoing geopolitical shifts, management’s move to boost its dividend and share repurchase program is viewed as a signal of confidence in the business outlook. See our latest analysis for Lockheed Martin. Despite turbulent markets, Lockheed Martin’s share...
